heading: HR00712
0: RESOLUTION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE ALLEGED FAILURE OF THE SMALL TOWN LOTTERY (STL) OPERATIONS OF THE PHILIPPINE CHARITY SWEEPSTAKES OFFICE (PCSO) IN GENERATING ITS PROJECTED INCOME RESULTING IN THE LOSS OF BILLIONS OF PESOS IN REVENUES ON THE PART OF THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT AND THE POSSIBLE USE OF ITS OPERATIONS FOR THE PROLIFERATION OF JUETENG AND OTHER ILLEGAL NUMBERS GAME IN THE COUNTRY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00712
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE ALLEGED FAILURE OF THE SMALL TOWN LOTTERY (STL) OPERATIONS OF THE PHILIPPINE CHARITY SWEEPSTAKES OFFICE (PCSO) IN GENERATING ITS PROJECTED INCOME RESULTING IN THE LOSS OF BILLIONS OF PESOS IN REVENUES ON THE PART OF THE NATIONAL GOVERNMENT AND THE POSSIBLE USE OF ITS OPERATIONS FOR THE PROLIFERATION OF JUETENG AND OTHER ILLEGAL NUMBERS GAME IN THE COUNTRY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

DATE FILED : 2017-01-24
